(Simplified: 绠)
Chinese Definition:
①汲水用的繩子：綆短汲深(喻才力不能勝任，多用作謙辭)。
②輪輻近軸處的突出部分。

綆字的基本解释

綆
gěng
见“绠”。

綆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gěng］
［《廣韻》古杏切，上梗，見。］
“绠1”的繁体字。
(1)绳索；汲水器上的绳索。
(2)指链条。
[②]［bǐng］
［《集韻》必郢切，上静，幫。］
“绠2”的繁体字。
古时轮辐近轴处的突出部分。

綆字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綆； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页925第04
〔古文〕䋁【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古杏切，音梗。【說文】汲井綆也。【揚子·方言】繘，自關而東，周洛韓魏之間謂之綆。【莊子·至樂篇】綆短不可汲深。【玉篇】亦作䋁。　又【集韻】必郢切，音餠。【周禮·冬官考工記·輪人】眡其綆，欲其蚤之正也。【註】綆，讀爲餠，輪箄也。　又【集韻】補滿切，音䬳。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gěng］
["Guangyun" ancient apricot cut, top stem, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "绠1".
(1) Rope; the rope on the water pump.
(2) Refers to the chain.
[②]［bǐng］
["Ji Yun" must be cut, quiet, help. ]
"绠2" in traditional characters.
The protruding part near the axis of the spokes in ancient times.
绠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　绠; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 925 04
[Ancient text] Cheng [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient apricot cut, sound stem. [Said the text] Ji Jing Ling also. 【Yangtze Dialect】The 繘, from Guan to East, is called the 繘 between Zhou Luo, Han and Wei. [Zhuangzi·Zhu Le Chapter] The shortness can not be deep. [Jade articles] also used as a passerby.　[Jiyun] It must be sharp and cut, and the sound is great. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Lun Ren】Qi Qi, I want the flea to be right. [Note] 绠, read as 餠, wheel 箄 also.　[Jiyun] fills up and cuts, sound wa. The same meaning.
